properties.description: Party domain manages the entirety of data related to parties such as customers, vendors and suppliers, and maintains a single, consistent version of this data
Thing domain manages the entirety of data related to products, and maintains a single, consistent version of this data
Reference data domain manages all the reference data maintained in the platform to support MDM functionality
Location domain is a place holder for all locations data to support location Management features
Generic domain is a place holder for all domain agnostic data maintained in the platform to support MDM functionality
Digital Asset domain is a place holder for all Digital Assets data to support Digital Asset Management features
